title: Unpopular opinion
description: You don't need a college degree to get a high paying job.

title: Am I the only one who dislike the band called the Beatles ...
description: It's like boomers...chill.. They are not that graet.

title: Code switching is exhausting
description: For people of color, code-switching is a means of professional (and sometimes ) survival. Though this kind of code-switching is often second nature, it can lead to emotional exhaustion and burnout.
